errors.error_description: Incorrect Django management command syntax with invalid settings parameter format
correction_candidates: To get started with NetBox, clone the repository and run `python manage.py runserver` to start the development server.
To get started with NetBox, clone the repository and run `./manage.py runserver --settings netbox.settings.development` to start the development server.
To get started with NetBox, clone the repository and run `python manage.py runserver` with the appropriate settings configuration to start the development server.
To get started with NetBox, clone the repository and run `python netbox/manage.py runserver` to start the development server.
errors.golden_answer: To get started with NetBox, clone the repository and run `python manage.py runserver` to start the development server.
